title: Oil review. No. 14
creator_credit: Greenpark Productions, Film Producers Guild and Humphrey Swingler
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. Tools for the job: showing modern and unusual applications of mechanised equipment to agricultural work. 2. Land for a refinery: showing the work of a Dutch firm reclaiming some of the wild marshy land of the Isle of Grain in the Thames estuary - the site for a new oil refinery.
